briefdescription.para: This node implements all the rosplan actions in a single node.

detaileddescription.para:
Client Services: /go_to_point [std_srvs/SetBool] /manipulation [std_srvs/SetBool] /get_id [erl_assignment_2_msgs/GetId] /oracle_solution [erl2/Oracle] /mark_wrong_id [erl_assignment_2_msgs/MarkWrongId] ] Action Services:
None Description:
This node implements the rosplan actions declared inside the pddl domain. For optimisation reasons, topics and services gets allocated only once the action gets called for the first time through the rosplan action dispatcher
